name: GetClickupAccessToken
description:
Obtain an OAuth access token for ClickUp API authentication.

Use this tool to obtain an OAuth access token for authenticating applications with the ClickUp API. This tool is not for personal API tokens and does not support the 'Try It' feature in browser-based API documentation.

parameters.name: oauth_credentials
parameters.description: JSON object containing 'client_id', 'client_secret', and 'code' for OAuth access.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
